analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika bhāvanāya pahātabba duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na bhāvanāya

original: pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: a nidassana appaṭigham na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: nana bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
